_comment: Add a _ before an option name to comment it out and it wont be added to the apworld
Using 'goal' as the name of an option let you override some of the generated goal parameters
goal.description:
Choose your victory condition.
Main Game Victory - Beat the 3 rounds against the Dealer in a normal playthrough.
Double or Nothing Short - Cash out of Double or Nothing with $100K or more.
Double or Nothing Long - Cash out of Double or Nothing with $1M or more.
Items will logically allow you to complete more rounds in both goal conditions.
However, the rounds can be beaten out of logic with less items...if you're feeling lucky.

filler_traps._comment: Using values here let you set a 'recommended' filler_trap percentage or even a default percentage
